templateData.kat:
The Bal Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Epic}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_epic_level_1 = {{Coins|2,000,000}}
100 [[File:SkyBlock_items_yoggie.png|25px|link=Yoggie]] [[Yoggie]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|1,400,000}}
100 [[File:SkyBlock_items_yoggie.png|25px|link=Yoggie]] [[Yoggie]] |time_epic = 10 Days }}
